title: Third Eye Craft Affair — November Edition
tagline: Keep Smiling — Where Craft, Medicine & Magic Meet

admission.display: $20.00 entry or $10.00 along with 4 donated items

age_policy: Must be 21+ or 18+ with valid med card to participate.

location.display: The Fledge – 1300 Eureka St, Lansing, MI 48912

copy.intro: Join us for the November edition of the Third Eye Craft Affair!
body_paragraphs: Come on down and discover an incredible selection of fantastic vendors!
Enjoy a refreshing dab or flower from The Emerald City — just follow the yellow brick road.
Indulge in delicious food offerings from Arepa Paradise, then relax and immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere.
Get ready to groove to the beats of our amazing DJ, Big Sherm!
We’ll have plenty of fun, games, and community spirit, ensuring everyone has a great time.
Let’s celebrate creativity and connection until the last person leaves the building!

highlights: Dab & Flower Bar — The Emerald City
DJ Big Sherm on the decks
Plenty of space to chill, connect, and create

seo.meta_title: Third Eye Craft Affair — Sat, Nov 15 • 12–6pm at The Fledge
seo.meta_description: Vendors, dab & flower bar (Emerald City), Arepa Paradise, DJ Big Sherm. $20 entry or $10 with 4 donated items. Open consumption. 21+ or 18+ with med card.
